name: Together or Alone
description:
A short game about a single unwed mother in Japan made for a school project. It also generally covers other people who are marginalized and discriminated against by normative family structures. 

I also wrote a short paper on the game, so if you want to learn more about why I made it and what I'm trying to do, read that.

WARNING: Contains the theme of abortion.

Note for Mac Users: the version is not currently up to date, but will be updated soon.

This is not a complete game so there will be bugs and lack of polish. I will probably never fully polish the game.
